subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Trent Green, who ended last season on injured reserve after his second concussion in 13 months, agreed to terms Monday on a three-year contract with the St. Louis Rams. In his second stint with the Rams, Green will be the backup to Marc Bulger. He was supposed to be the starter in 1999 before a preseason knee surgery paved the way for Kurt Warner, who led the Rams to their first Super Bowl victory. Green, who replaces Gus Frerotte as Bulger’s backup, was released by the Dolphins last month.
